subject: Sales
title: Building Your Own Methodology
description: A quick, practical guide to Building Your Own Methodology.

hook.text: After years testing frameworks, a veteran seller builds her own system. It outperforms everything else.

buildup.text: Custom methodologies combine personal experience, proven techniques, and market-specific insights.

discovery.text: The best personal systems evolve continuously. Every deal teaches something new that refines the method.

twist.text: Personal methods are hard to teach. What works for one seller's personality may not transfer to a team.

climax.text: Document what works for you. Test and refine it. Share the principles even if the style is yours alone.

punchline.text: Build your method from experience. Iterate forever.

quiz.question: What is the foundation of a personal sales methodology?
options: Copying a famous seller's approach exactly
Combining personal experience with proven techniques
